snippet: The Millrose Games indoor track and field meet on Feb. 16 at the Armory will be shown live on ESPN3, a Web service, and via tape delay on ESPN.
abstract: Millrose Games, track and field competition that was moved to the Armory in Upper Manhattan in 2012, will be broadcast live on Feb 16, 2013, on ESPN 3, Web-based service, and re-broadcast on ESPN the following evening.
lead_paragraph: The Millrose Games indoor track and field meet on Feb. 16 at the Armory will be shown live on ESPN3, a Web service, and via tape delay on ESPN.
